column4: i have a problem with my soundcard in ubuntu! when i hit alsamixer it says card: hda intel and chip :realtek alc885, like i said, im using dual boot(ubuntu and windows xp) in windows my sound work great..but when i enter ubuntu wich i installed 4 days ago..nothing happens...i tried posting on ubuntu forums but no reply, so please anyone..help!!!

Make sure none of them are muted.
I need to run to a short meeting, but I should be back in a few.
Do you have an onboard video card?
You said that alsamixer listed your mixers.  Are you sure that none of them are muted?
please STOP using enter as punctuation, you have been warned multiple times.
